title: dEvan kE pati
sahitya:
dEvan kE pati indra tArA kE pati candra vidyA kE pati gaNEsh dukkha bhAra hari


caraNam 1    rAgapati kAnhaDAbAjan kE pati bIn rtupati hE vasant rati sukhakAri
    caraNam 2    munijanapativuAsa pacchIpati hams hai narapati rAm avadhavihAri
    caraNam 3    giripati himAcal bhUtan kE pati mahEshtIn lOkpati shrI padmanAbh giridhAr
